SEND.LABEL: Label
SEND.LABELPLACEHOLDER: Kenya lengolo bakeng sa aterese ena ho e kenyelletsa bukeng ea hau ea aterese
SEND.SELECTINPUTSTITLE: Khetha Methati ea ho e Sebelisa
SEND.INPUTLOCKED: Input e koetsoe. O tla hloka ho bula monyetla ona ho o sebelisa.
SEND.ALERTFEECHANGECONTENT: Chelete ea sebele ea theko e phahameng ho feta kamoo ho lebeletsoeng kateng. Ka kopo netefatsa tefello e ncha:

STAKING.STAKINGTITLE: Hona joale li-Wallet li ntse li tsitsa
STAKING.NOTENABLEDINFO: Hona joale ha ho hajoe Staking.
STAKING.NOTENABLEDINSTR: Ha u le thupeng u tla hloka ho lumella staking setting staking = 1 ka faele ea hau ea metrix.conf.
STAKING.NOTSTAKINGINFO: Kajeno sepache sa hao se koetsoe bakeng sa staking.
STAKING.NOTSTAKINGINSTR: U ka qala ho tsitsa ka ho bula sepache sa hau bakeng sa staking

MASTERNODES.NOMNOUTPUTS: Ha ho liphetho tsa Masternode tse fumanoeng. Ho tsamaisa Masternode ea lehae romella lichelete tsa 2 000 000 hantle atereseng ea hau ea Masternode 'me u emetse likhakanyo tse 15.
MASTERNODES.LOCALNOTRUNNING: Masternode ea Lehae Ha e Mathe
MASTERNODES.REMOTENOTRUNNING: Masternode e hole ha e fumanoe

SIGNMESSAGE.SIGN_DESCRIPTION: O ka saena melaetsa le liaterese tsa hau ho paka hore u ba le bona. E-ba hlokolosi hore u se ke ua saena letho le hlakileng, joalokaha tlhaselo ea phishing e ka 'na ea leka ho u qhekella hore u saena lebitso la hao ho bona. Bontša feela lipolelo tse qaqileng ka botlalo tseo u li lumelang.
SIGNMESSAGE.VERIFY_DESCRIPTION: Kenya molaetsa oa ho saena, molaetsa (etsa bonnete ba hore u kopitsa likhetho tsa melaetsa, libaka, li-tab, joalo-joalo) le saena ka tlasa ho netefatsa molaetsa. E-ba hlokolosi hore u se ke ua bala ho feta ho saena ho feta se leng molaetsa o saenneng ka boeena, ho qoba ho qhekelloa ke tlhaselo ea motho ka hare.
SIGNMESSAGE.VERIFYFAIL: Ho netefatsa molaetsa ha hoa atleha

ABOUT.BESTBLOCKTTIME: Nako ea ho qetela ea thibelo

DEBUG.CONSOLEINFO: Rea o amohela ho console ea Metrix Core RPC. Tlatsa thuso bakeng sa kakaretso ea litaelo tse teng.
DEBUG.CONSOLEWARNING: TŠENYETSO: Bahlaseli ba 'nile ba sebetsa, ba bolella basebelisi hore ba thaepe litaelo mona, ba utsoetse sepache sa bona kahare. U se ke ua sebelisa console ena u sa utloisise ka botlalo ramification ea taelo.

REPAIR.INFOEXTERNAL: Melao ena ea ho lokisa ha e sebetse ha Metrix Core e matha ka ntle
REPAIR.INFO: Likhohlopo tse ka tlase li tla qala hape Metrix Core ka mekhoa ea litaelo tsa litaelo ho lokisa sepache, ho lokisa litaba le lifaele tse senyehileng kapa ho se sebetse.
REPAIR.SALVAGEINFO: -salvagewallet: Teko ea ho fumana mefuta ea sekhukhu e tsoang sepacheng se senyehileng.dat.
REPAIR.RESCANINFO: -rescan: Hlakola blockchain bakeng sa lits'ebetso tsa sepache tse lahlehileng.
REPAIR.RECOVER1INFO: -zapwallettxes = 1: Fumana litšebelisano ho tloha blockchain (boloka meta-data, mohlala, mong'a akhaonto)
REPAIR.RECOVER2INFO: -zapwallettxes = 2: Fumana litšebelisano ho tloha blockchain (laola meta-data)
REPAIR.UPGRADEWALLETINFO: -upgradewallet: Ntlafatso ea sepache ho ea ho morao-rao mokhoa oa ho qala. (Tlhokomeliso: ena HA HO tlhaloso ea sepache ka boeona!)
REPAIR.REBUILDINDEXINFO: -reindex: Hlahloba index ea blockchain ho tloha ho li-files tsa hona joale tsa blk000 ??.
REPAIR.BOOTSTRAPINFO: Ho jarolla lifaele tsa Metrix blockchain ho tloha metrixcoin.com le bootstrap ho kenya ha hau. Ho latela khokahano ea hau ea marang-rang sena se ka nka metsotso e 10 ho isa lihora tse 'maloa

EXPLORER.SEARCHNORESULTS: Ha e khone ho fumana sepheo kapa transaction e tšoanang le patlisiso ea hau

NETWORK.PROXYTOR: Sebelisa proxy SOCKS5 e lekanang ho fihlela lithaka ka litšebeletso tse patiloeng tsa Tor
NETWORK.BLOCKINCOMING: U se ke ua lumella li-connections tse kenang
NETWORK.RESTARTREQUIRED: Moahloli o qala ho ts'oanela ho etsa liphetoho leha e le life ho maemo ana.

WINDOW.MINIMIZETOTRAY: Fokotsa ho betra ho e-na le barbara ea mosebetsi

SYNC.TIMESINCEBLOCK: ho tloha sethalong sa ho qetela

STATUS.UNLOCKEDANON: Wallet e koetsoe bakeng sa ho tsebahala feela
STATUS.STAKING: Hona joale li-Wallet li ntse li tsitsa
STATUS.NOTSTAKING: Hona ha hona joale bolleteng ha bo ts'oane
STATUS.MASTERNODEON: Masternode e ntse e sebetsa hona joale
STATUS.MASTERNODEOFF: Hona joale Masternode ha e sebetse

PROMPT.ENTERPASSPHRASETITLE: Kenya Passphrase ea Wallet ea hau
PROMPT.CLIENTUPDATETITLE: Lenaneo la Cinda la Metrix le fumaneha
PROMPT.CLIENTUPDATEINFO: Nchafatso e fumaneha bakeng sa Metrix Core. O ka rata ho e kenya hona joale?
PROMPT.WALLETUPDATEINFO: Nchafatso e fumaneha bakeng sa Boemo ba Altitude. Na u ka rata ho e jarolla hona joale?
PROMPT.CHANGEPASSPHRASETITLE: Fetola phapanyetsano ea sepache sa hau
PROMPT.CLIENTSTOPPEDTITLE: Metrix Core o ile a emisa
PROMPT.CLIENTSTOPPEDINFO: Kopano e lahlile ho Metrix Core. U ka emisa sepache kapa qala Metrix Core ea ka hare.
PROMPT.ENCRYPTEDCONTENT: Tlhahiso leha e le efe e fetileng eo u e entseng ea faele ea hau ea sepache e lokela ho nkeloa sebaka ke faele ea sepache e sa tsoa hlahisoa, e ngotsoeng. Bakeng sa mabaka a tšireletso, likopi tse fetileng tsa faele ea sepache tse sa ngolisoeng li tla ba se nang thuso hang ha u qala ho sebelisa sepache se secha, se kentsoeng.
PROMPT.CLIENTCLOSEDUNEXPECTEDTITLE: Metrix Core o ile a ema ka tšohanyetso
PROMPT.CLIENTCLOSEDUNEXPECTEDINFO: Ho bile le bothata le Metrix Core e entseng hore e felisoe. E khothaletsa ho hlahloba faele ea hau ea debug.log bakeng sa lintlha.
PROMPT.CLIENTINVALIDCONFIGTITLE: Tlhokomelo e sa nepahaleng ea metrix.conf
PROMPT.CLIENTINVALIDCONFIGINFO: metrix.conf ea hau e na le setupane sa masternode se sa nepahalang se tla etsa hore Metrix Core a tsoe hang-hang. Ka kopo, sheba faele ena.
PROMPT.BOOTSTRAPFAILEDTITLE: Metrix Core Bootstrap e ile ea hloleha
PROMPT.BOOTSTRAPFAILEDINFO: Ho ne ho e-na le bothata bootstrging Metrix Core. Ho khothaletsoa ho lekola faele ea hau ea sebaka sa Altitude bakeng sa litaba.

ADDRESSBOOK.TITLE: Buka ea Aterese
ADDRESSBOOK.SENDINGINFO: Ena ke aterese ea hau ea pholoho ea Metrix bakeng sa ho romella tefo. Kamehla hlahloba chelete le ho amohela aterese pele u romela lichelete tsa tšepe
ADDRESSBOOK.RECEIVINGINFO: Ena ke aterese ea hau ea pholoso ea Metrix bakeng sa ho amohela litefello.

HELP.TITLE: Thusa
HELP.CHECKUPDATECORE: Sheba Lenane la Core la Metrix...

MISC.ENTERACCOUNTLABEL: Kenya lebokose bakeng sa aterese ena

CLIENTSTATUS.UPDATEAVAILABLE: Lenaneo la Cinda la Metrix le fumaneha

NOTIFICATIONS.CREATEDNEWACCOUNT: Konte e ncha e entsoe ka katleho
NOTIFICATIONS.ADDRESSCOPIEDCLIPBOARD: Aterese e kopitsoe ho lebokose la lipapali
NOTIFICATIONS.PASSPHRASEMISMATCH: Litemana tseo u li ngotseng ha li lumellane
NOTIFICATIONS.CHECKINGUPDATEFAILED: Ha e khone ho sheba tlhahlobo. Sheba marang-rang oa hau.
NOTIFICATIONS.SENDINGEXCEEDSBALANCE: Chelete eo ue romelang e fapane le tekanyo ea hau e khethiloeng
NOTIFICATIONS.MISSINGCHANGEADDRESS: O tlameha ho hlakisa aterese ea phetoho
NOTIFICATIONS.MISSINGDESTINATIONADDRESS: O tlameha ho hlakisa aterese ea libaka
NOTIFICATIONS.MISSINGAMOUNTTOSEND: U tlameha ho tobetsa chelete e le hore u romelle
NOTIFICATIONS.INSUFFICIENTBALANCE: Ho leka-lekaneng ho lekanyelitsoeng ho tlatsa ketsahalo ena
NOTIFICATIONS.GENERICERROR: Phoso e sa tsejoeng e hlahile. U ka 'na ua tlameha ho qala mokotlana oa hau' me u leke hape. Haeba mathata a ntse a tsoela pele ka kopo, ikopanye le thuso.
NOTIFICATIONS.TRANSACTIONMISMATCH: Phoso ea transaction. Ka kopo leka hape.
NOTIFICATIONS.MINIMUMCONFIRMATIONS: Lintho tsohle tse hlokahalang li hloka bonnete ba 1 pele u qeta.
NOTIFICATIONS.TRANSACTIONSCOPIEDCLIPBOARD: Litšebetso li kopitsoa ho lebokose la lipapali
NOTIFICATIONS.TRANSACTIONOUTPUTTOOLARGE: E 'ngoe ea moputso oa hau ho chelete e le kholo haholo hore e se ke ea romeloa ka mokhoa o sireletsehileng. Boholo ke 90,071,992,54740992.
NOTIFICATIONS.TRANSACTIONCHANGETOOLARGE: Phetoho ea hau e kholo haholo hore e ka romeloa ka mokhoa o sireletsehileng. Boholo ke 90,071,992,54740992.
NOTIFICATIONS.FAILEDTOWRITECONFIG: Ho bile le bothata ho ngolla file ea hau ea metrix.conf. Lekola faele e le teng le hore Altitude e na le tumello ea ho ngola.
NOTIFICATIONS.NOPUBLICUP: Ha ho aterese ea IP ea Sechaba e fumanoeng. Sheba khokahano ea hau ea inthanete ebe o qala bocha Altitude.

HOME.INFOLINE1: Ha u se u na le aterese ea BTC ea depositi BTC efe kapa efe e rometsoeng atereseng eo ka boeona e tla kenelletse MRX atereseng ea hau ea MRX e khethiloeng.
HOME.INFOLINE2-1: Ts'ebetso hangata e hlakile ka nako ea hora ho latela linako tsa block ea Bitcoin. Re ka amohela fiat bakeng
HOME.INFOLINE2-3: Sena se tla fetoleloa ho BTC pele ebe MRX.
HOME.INFOLINE3: Hang ha depositi ea hau ea BTC e hlakisitse u tla amohela MRX ea hau atereseng ea hau e khethiloeng.
HOME.FIATSWAPSELECTED: U tla romelloa ho Buy.Metrixcoin.com ho phethela tšebetso ena

NOTIFICATIONS.ALREADYHAVEADDRESS: U se u ntse u na le aterese ea BTC e amanang le aterese ena ea Metrix
NOTIFICATIONS.SWAPUSDMIN: Chelete e fetotsoeng bonyane ba USD ke $ 50
NOTIFICATIONS.SWAPUSDMAX: Chelete e fetotsoeng kaholimo ho USD ke $ 3000
NOTIFICATIONS.NOADDRESS: Ha ua kena aterese ea Metrix
